content: सज्जनं {@--1@} Fastening, tying on. {@--2@} Dressing. {@--3@} Preparing, arming, equipping. {@--4@} A guard, sentry. {@--5@} A ferry, {%ghāt%}. --नः A good man; see under सत्. --ना {@--1@} Decoration, accoutrement, equipment. {@--2@} Dressing ornamenting.
--जन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सज्जन) good, virtuous, respectable. (--नः a good or virtuous man.
